Title: Provides an additional apportionment for operating aid to school districts which contract for the education of the students of one district by the other school district
Summary: Provides an additional apportionment for operating aid to school districts which contract for the education of the students of one district by the other school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing for state apportionments to school districts sending and receiving pupils pursuant to a contract system
